title: Ask someone who has had 27 accounts perma banned anything
body: As stated above, played since early season 2... I'm open for all discussions.

replies.body:
I may or may not be impressed
it depends how you got banned
May i ask a brief summary of your uh... "History" with the community to get you such an infamous mile stone?
I suggest picking up hardcore narcotics. Your life will go fast lol.

that's a big number. I'm curious, why have you been banned 23 times? like the overall theme, was it a goal? do you tilt easily? are you trying to troll or the moment a teammate is toxic you decide to int? What is your motivation?
